posts.post_content:
I am looking for the following T210 Orange Border cards:

Alexander
Munsell
Thebo

I have a small group of 6 duplicate OB's to offer in trade or if you prefer cash we can go that route as well. If you have one of these three cards available I would really like to hear from you. Condition isnt a factor. Please message me for an available trade list if you have any interest. Thanks guys.

Curry G/VG 245.00
Gordon SGC 35 Traded
Nagel SGC 35 260.00
Northern G/VG Traded
Slaven SGC 20 SOLD
Yantz PSA 4 325.00

Im willing to trade two for one on the Orange Borders. I would really like to knock one of the three off before the National. Also willing to purchase or half trade half cash. Really im up for anything to get a little closer.
No takers for the scarce OB's?

Jason,
If you ever run into a T-210 Carson Series 8 I would be very much interested in purchasing it. You seem to be more in touch with the T-210's than others at Net54.

Thank you, Dan Carson

Orange borders look awesome hopefully one day I can get one in the future.
Good luck with your sale or trade
